WRITING.TITLE: [NEWS] Freedom
WRITING.TEXT: Growing in the Republic of Texas is a new political party, the Texan Independence movement, whose goal is, as one can tell, the Independence of The Republic of Texas. This party is currently a both a small and old party, rivaling only the Texas Christian's party, with approximately 5,000 currently registered members, and of those most being supporters of the original secession of Texas. However, the Party is expected to grow further as word of it spreads to others who took part and supported the original secession of Texas back in the 2010's. While currently small and inconsequential, this new faction bears watching.

WRITING.TITLE: [META] Pinging
WRITING.TEXT: If you're doing crap that pertains to Texas specifically or generally, it would be nice to either get pinged or involved in the discussion plz

WRITING.TITLE: [NEWS] Capital of Texas
WRITING.TEXT: The Senate and House both uninamosally voted to move the Capital of The Republic of Texas to Austin today.

WRITING.TITLE: [DIPLOMACY] To America- Regarding greater Autonomy
WRITING.TEXT: The Government of The Republic of Texas would like to request greater autonomy from the United States of America. While this does not mean that Texas is declaring independence or is making plans to declare independence, It does mean that Texas wishes to have more freedom in opening Dialogue with foreign nations and the Deployment of troops to areas of conflict. The terms proposed by Texas are thus: Permitting Texas to open dialogue with Foreign countries regarding economic matters within Texas Permitting Texas to Contract Pmc's to carry out security on facilities required, or to provide training Permitting Texas to purchase arms and equipment form foreign countries Any additional concerns will be brought up, and these Terms may be discussed and changed.

WRITING.TITLE: [NEWS] Prairie Party Pushes
WRITING.TEXT: The Prairie Party, who look and believe in similar ideals to the American Unionist Party, have slowly been gaining members, and are now One million strong. While they currently have no chance of an election to high office, such as Governor or a member of his cabinet, they would definitely be able to secure seats in the Senate or House given time, money, and clever campaigning.
After conferring, we have decided that we must take back our offer.
We would like to offer 3 Million for all four ships as well as lease of the current crews to train Texans on the use of these ships.
How much Each for both Classes of Corvette?

WRITING.TITLE: [EVENT] Recruitment
WRITING.TEXT: The Republic of Texas has undertaken a massive recruitment drive in order to create another infantry division of the National Guard, in order to allow both Texas and The United States to respond to threats both Foreign and Domestic. The new division will be christened the 83rd Infantry Division, and will consist of four Regiments, being the 81st Infantry Regiment, the 107th Infantry Regiment, the 53rd Infantry Regiment, and the 101st Infantry Regiment. The cost of Vehicles, equipment, and training will be around $2 Billion if all goes well, and will take about four-five months for training of all assets.
